price: I sakupiše se Sulejmanu vojske njegove – džini, ljudi i ptice, sve četa do čete, postrojeni,
arabic: وَحُشِرَ لِسُلَيۡمَٰنَ جُنُودُهُۥ مِنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ وَٱلۡإِنسِ وَٱلطَّيۡرِ فَهُمۡ يُوزَعُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waḥushira lisulaymāna junūduhu mina al-jini wal-insi wal-ṭayri fahum yūzaʿūna
